message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1500000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the opportunity to discuss the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but I believe we can find a price that works better for both of us. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1350000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $1380000. This is my final concession, so I hope we can reach an agreement at this price.
I respect your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $1360000.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I still need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1370000, but that's as low as I can go. I hope we can agree on this price.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1365000.

I'm starting to feel that we're getting very close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can meet you at $1370000, but I need to be clear that this is my absolute final offer. If we can agree on this price, I'm confident we can finalize the sale.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1367500.
